title: Top Gun
production_studio: Paramount Pictures, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

title: Aliens
description: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the principal thinks of that.

title: Platoon
description: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

title: Blue Velvet
description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

title: Stand by Me
description: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a boyhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

title: Hannah and Her Sisters
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: The story of three sisters and their complex relationships with each other and the men in their lives.

title: The Fly
description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

title: Labyrinth
description: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.

title: Hoosiers
description: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship.

title: The Color of Money
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners II
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but talented pool player the ropes of hustling.

title: Children of a Lesser God
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A new teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with a deaf woman who is a former student.

title: Little Shop of Horrors
description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

title: Crocodile Dundee
description: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to 1986 San Francisco to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

title: Manhunter
description: A former FBI profiler is called out of retirement to catch a serial killer.

title: Highlander
production_studio: EMI Films, Thorn EMI Screen Entertainment
description: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponents, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled 'Prize'.

title: The Hitcher
description: A young man who transports a car from Chicago to San Diego is stalked by a mysterious and deadly hitchhiker.

title: Big Trouble in Little China
description: A rough-and-tumble trucker and his sidekick get caught up in a centuries-old mystical battle in San Francisco's Chinatown.

title: Pretty in Pink
description: A poor girl who is a social outcast at her high school must choose between the affections of her quirky best friend and a rich, sensitive playboy.

title: The Mission
description: In the 18th century, a Spanish Jesuit priest goes into the South American jungle to build a mission and convert a community of Guarani Indians to Christianity.

title: The Name of the Rose
description: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in a medieval monastery.

title: Down by Law
description: The story of three men who escape from a Louisiana prison and their journey through the bayou.

title: 'Round Midnight
description: An aging, alcoholic jazz musician in Paris is befriended by a young fan who tries to help him get his life back on track.

title: Heartbreak Ridge
description: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant is assigned to train a group of undisciplined recruits.

title: Peggy Sue Got Married
description: A woman on the verge of a divorce faints at her high school reunion and wakes up in 1960, with a chance to change her life.

title: Crimes of the Heart
description: Three sisters with a history of family dysfunction are reunited in their Mississippi hometown.

title: Mona Lisa
description: An ex-con hired to be the driver for a high-class call girl finds himself drawn into a dangerous world of crime and obsession.

title: Sid and Nancy
description: The story of the self-destructive relationship between Sex Pistols bassist Sid Vicious and his girlfriend, Nancy Spungen.

title: Something Wild
description: A straitlaced businessman's life is turned upside down when he gets involved with a free-spirited woman and her dangerous ex-convict husband.

title: The Mosquito Coast
description: An idealistic inventor who is disillusioned with American consumerism moves his family to a remote jungle in Central America to start a new life.

title: An American Tail
description: A young Russian mouse gets separated from his family while they are emigrating to the United States.

title: She's Gotta Have It
description: The story of a young, independent woman in Brooklyn who is juggling three different lovers.

title: Short Circuit
description: An experimental military robot is struck by lightning and gains a human-like intelligence.

title: Jean de Florette
description: In a rural French village, an old man and his nephew conspire to cheat a naive city dweller out of his inheritance.

title: The Great Mouse Detective

director.name: Ron Clements, Burny Mattinson, David Michener, John Musker

description: A mouse detective and his faithful partner must stop a diabolical rat from taking over the British monarchy.

title: Back to School
description: To help his son get through college, a fun-loving and obnoxious millionaire decides to join him.

title: Cobra
description: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

title: About Last Night...
description: A man and a woman who have a one-night stand try to turn it into a real relationship.
